meanings.sent1: During winter, many people enjoy langlauf in the snowy mountains.
meanings.sent2: She learned langlauf from a young age and became a skilled skier.
meanings.sent3: The langlauf competition had skiers racing through the forest like graceful snowflakes.
meanings.sent4: His movements on the langlauf track were as smooth as a flowing river.
meanings.sent5: Langlauf requires stamina and balance to glide gracefully on the snow-covered trails.

meanings.definition: To participate in the sport of langlauf.
meanings.sent1: They langlaufed together every weekend, enjoying the fresh air and exercise.
meanings.sent2: I want to langlauf with my friends next winter to stay active.
meanings.sent3: Langlaufing down the hill, they laughed and cheered, feeling free and alive.
meanings.sent4: She langlaufed through the forest, feeling the thrill of speed and freedom.
meanings.sent5: Langlaufing is a great way to explore nature while getting a good workout.

meanings.definition: The act of skiing long distances over flat terrain.
meanings.sent1: The langlauf across the frozen lake was peaceful and invigorating.
meanings.sent2: Langlauf is a wonderful way to enjoy the winter scenery at a leisurely pace.
meanings.sent3: He decided to langlauf to the nearby village instead of taking the bus.
meanings.sent4: The langlauf through the meadow was a serene experience under the clear blue sky.
meanings.sent5: Langlauf allows you to explore vast snowy landscapes at your own pace.
